original: It is I, Professor Calvert! Don't bother looking around, I'm in your mind!
translation: 就是我，卡尔弗特教授！不用到处看了，我就在你的心里。

original: But, aren't you Desmond's faithful little employee? Coming to gum up my work, are we? Well... I have a better idea...
translation: 可是，你不是德斯蒙德忠心耿耿的小帮手吗？是来我给我制造麻烦吗？嗯……我有个更好的主意……

original: How about instead of playing his game, you destroy that nasty little device?
translation: 不要帮他做事了，帮我除掉那个令人讨厌的设备，你看怎么样啊？

original: Deposit it in the nearby trash compactor and we will never have to worry about it again.
translation: 你只要把它放到离你最近的垃圾压缩机里，我们就永远不用去担心了。

original: I assure you that the gratitude of Professor Calvert is worth a great deal more than that of a washed up old limey.
translation: 我保证卡尔弗特教授的感激要远比那个英国佬来得要有价值得多。

original: Processing... Processing... Voice ID confirmed. Access granted.
translation: 处理中…处理中…声音身份验证。

original: Password: Verified! Voice ID: Mismatch! Access denied - User voice unauthorized.
translation: 密码：通过验证！声音身份：匹配错误！拒绝访问 - 用户声音未经授权。

original: Voice ID or password not recognized. Access Denied.
translation: 声音身份或密码未能识别。拒绝访问。

original: Go to the bank and use password xìn tian weng.  The software is configured to recognize only our voices.
translation: 去银行，并且使用密码xin tian weng。软件已被设置为只会识别我们的声音。

original: Excellent! Most excellent! I knew that you would make the right choice.
translation: 太好了！真的是太好了！我就知道你能做出正确的决定。

original: And now it is time for Desmond to meet his end! He's made a fatal mistake!
translation: 现在，是时候让德斯蒙德去死了！它已经犯下了一个极其严重的错误！

original: Return to Calvert Mansion. I have something there that I'd like you to see.
translation: 回到卡尔弗特公馆里。我有一些东西想让你瞧瞧。

original: Agent Jiang; as you know, an important Chinese surveillance vessel was lost in American waters.
translation: 姜特工；如你所知，一艘中国侦察船在美国海域失踪。

original: Your mission is to destroy derelict submarine SSN-37-1A before the Americans can recover and analyze it.
translation: 你的任务是在美国人修复以及开始分析之前摧毁掉被抛弃的潜水艇SSN-37-1A号。

original: The recovery location is included in this dossier, and your cover ensures that the Americans will allow you access to their recovery operation.
translation: 这份文件里有说明修复作业的详细地点，并且你的伪装也会使你顺利加入到他们的修复作业当中。

original: However; you will need an authorization code to trigger the self-destruct sequence.
translation: 然而；你需要授权码来启动自毁装置。

original: One of our field operatives in your area, Agent Yang, has these codes hidden in a dental capsule, but her current whereabouts are unknown.
translation: 我们一位战地联络员，杨特工，拥有这个授权码，她将这一信息隐藏在一个胶囊里。但是目前她去向不明。

original: Locate and rendezvous with Agent Yang, then destroy the submarine. Report to your safehouse for extraction information when the mission is complete.
translation: 取得与杨特工的联系，并且与她会合，然后摧毁潜艇。当完成任务后，回到据点作任务简报。

original: The will of the People protect you, Agent Jiang.
translation: 愿人民的意志保佑你，姜特工。

original: Why don't you two just talk it over?
translation: 你们俩为什么不谈谈呢？

original: Talking is irrelevant! He must be destroyed!
Assist me, and your reward will be great!
translation: 帮助我，你将有丰厚的报酬！

original: I'm so sick of you. Both of you.
translation: 你们两个真是，太恶心了！

original: Your sickness is irrelevant! If you require it, I shall reward you!
translation: 你的病不会影响大局！如果你想要，我可以奖赏给你！

original: He is my enemy! And you will be rewarded!
translation: 他是我的敌人！我会付你报酬的！

original: No way I'm paying that. I'll stay here.
translation: 我不会付这个钱的。我就留在这里。

original: I'm kind of busy. Find her on your own.
translation: 我有点忙，你自己找她吧。

original: Please, I'm not asking for much. But if you're going to Point Lookout, and you find a girl named Nadine, just give her this note.
translation: 求求你，我不会要求太多。如果你要去望海崖，并且找到一个名叫娜丁的女孩的话，请把这张纸条给她。

original: She stowed away on that boat, and I haven't heard from her ever since. I'll do anything if it'll help find her.
translation: 自从她离开船以后，我就再也没听过关于她的消息。我会尽我一切力量帮助你找到她。

original: I can't promise anything, but I'll look for her.
translation: 我不能承诺什么，但我会去试着找找。

original: Oh, bless you! Her name is Nadine, and she left a couple weeks ago. Said she wanted to see the world, silly little thing that she is.
translation: 哦，祝福你！她的名字叫娜丁，她几周前就已经离开这里了。她说她想要用自己的双眼去看看这个世界，多么愚蠢的小女孩啊。

original: That Tobar said he dropped her off at Point Lookout, but who knows what's happened to her since then?
translation: 托巴尔说她在望海崖就下船了，但是谁知道那之后她又遇上了什么事情呢？

original: I don't know if you can convince my little Nadine to come back, but just give her this note from me, would you?
translation: 我不知道你能否把我的小娜丁带回来，但是至少请把这张纸条带给她，可以吗？

original: Dad taught me never to accept rides from strangers.
translation: 我爸爸告诉我，永远不要任由陌生人摆布。

original: Ah, but he's not here, now is he? And besides, I'm no stranger! I'm Tobar the Ferryman, at your service!
translation: 但他不在这儿，对吧？再者，我不是陌生人！我是船长托巴尔，愿为你效劳。

original: I might be. What's so special about Point Lookout?
translation: 我或许是的。望海崖有什么特别之处么？

original: You look like a man who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
translation: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。

original: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
translation: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。

original: But keep your wits about you, because you'll find more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're not man enough!
translation: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还不够强壮就先待在这儿吧！

original: You look like a woman who's been around the wastes, so I'll cut right to it.
translation: 你看起来像是个拾荒者，那我就直入主题。

original: In Point Lookout, you'll find fresh-grown food, mysterious locales, and treasures as-of-yet un-looted.
translation: 在望海崖，你能找到新鲜成熟的食物，神秘的地点和尚未被洗劫的宝藏。

original: But keep your wits about you, because there's more than a few exotic critters and inhospitable locals. So stay here if you're too dainty to rough it!
translation: 但你也要放机灵点，因为你会发现不止一种外来生物和不好客的本地人。要是你还太娇贵就先待在这儿吧！

original: I want to book passage to Point Lookout.
translation: 我想预定去 望海崖的行程。

original: Nice boat. You must have seen a lot of places with it.
translation: 真是条不错的船，你一定开着它去过了好多地方吧。

original: You should have seen her back in her heyday! Why, we traveled up and down the coast, from the Commonwealth to the Broken Banks.
translation: 你应该看看她最光辉时候的样子！我们沿着海岸旅行，从联邦旅行到破碎海岸。

original: Good times, but these days she's not fit to take out to the coast. Too many spouts ready to drown her, and too many critters looking for lunch.
translation: 那是一段美好的时光，但是最近她都没有再去海岸。太多的人打算用口水淹没她，而且也有太多饥饿的家伙在寻找午餐。

original: But the Point Lookout run is good enough for now. We've got a sweet deal ferrying cargo and the occasional traveler.
translation: 但是去望海崖的旅程在目前来说就已经足够了。我们已经达成了一个甜蜜的交易，去运送一些货物，有时候也运送一些旅行者。

original: I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
translation: 我在这待了很长时间了。上次我见着叫娜丁的鸟时，我还保存了她的皮呢。

original: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could... introduce myself.
translation: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但是在我还没来得及做自我介绍的时候，那个女孩子就跑了。

original: Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
translation: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

original: Ah, Nadine! Spritely little tomboy with more curiosity than common sense, that one.
translation: 啊， 娜丁！像个假小子一样，知道的不多，好奇心不少。

original: Caused so much trouble on the trip that I probably would have thrown her overboard... if she hadn't reminded me of myself at her age.
translation: 她在旅途中总是制造麻烦，要不是因为她钩起了我儿时的回忆，我早就把她扔到水里去了。

original: Haven't seen her since we hit land at Point Lookout. But knowing her, I'll bet she's gotten herself in plenty of trouble.
translation: 到达望海崖后我就没再见过她。但是基于我对她的了解，她肯定有卷入到什么麻烦里了吧。

original: A girl named Nadine caught a ride on your ship. Any idea where she is?
translation: 一个叫娜丁的女孩搭过你的船。知道她现在在哪吗？

original: She's about your age, and when she left, her hair was dyed bright orange. You shouldn't have any problem recognizing her.
translation: 她跟你差不多大，并且她离开的时候，染了橘红色的头发。你肯定一眼就能认出她来。

original: She told me she wanted to go find her fortune, but I thought it was too dangerous. I should've known better than to say that.
translation: 她告诉我说她要去寻找财富，但是我认为那太过危险了。我应该多劝劝她就好了。

original: Moment I told her she couldn't go, it was just a matter of time before she ran off...
translation: 那时候我跟她说不要走，实际上，她的离开只是时间上的问题。

original: What can you tell me about your daughter?
translation: 关于你的女儿你能告诉我些什么？

original: That sounds like her. Too busy having her adventures to think about family. Like mother, like daughter.
translation: 那听起来像是她的所作所为。总是忙于她自己的冒险以至于没什么时间去考虑家庭。像是母亲，或者女儿一类的事情。

original: I talked to your daughter, but she says she can't come back yet.
translation: 我跟你女儿谈过了，但她说她现在还不打算回来。

original: Yes, thank you so much! And now that she's got this boat and carrying all this cargo... well, I can afford to actually pay you! Thank you so much!
translation: 是啊，太感谢你了！现在她有了这艘船，还载着这么多货物……嗯，我真的付得起你的报酬了！太谢谢你了！

original: Got Nadine back, safe and sound.
translation: 把娜丁安然无恙地带回来。

original: I've been around for a long goddamn time. The last time I knew a bird named Nadine, I still had skin.
translation: 我在这待了很长时间了。上次我见着叫娜丁的鸟时，我还保存了她的皮呢。

original: There was some girl who came nosing around here a few weeks back, but she ran off before I could ... introduce myself.
translation: 几周前有个女孩子跑到这里来四处闲晃，但是在我还没来得及做自我介绍的时候，那个女孩子就跑了。

original: Have you seen a woman named Nadine?
translation: 你见过一个叫娜丁的女人吗?

original: What is this, a date? You start making a move, and it's stabbing time.
translation: 这算什么，约会吗？你倒是挺主动，不过，也是该出手的时候了。

original: What? There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
translation: 什么？我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？

original: No really, tell me about yourself.
There's not much to say. I ran off from home to see the world and find a fortune. And I'm doing it now, okay?
translation: 我没什么可说的。我从家里跑出来就是为了看看这个世界，找找财宝。并且我可以告诉你，我现在也是这么做的，明白吗？

original: Tell me more about Point Lookout.
translation: 告诉我更多关于望海崖的事。

original: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
translation: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的。

original: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
translation: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。

original: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
translation: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。

original: I'm here on my own business. You wouldn't understand it even if I tried to explain it to you.
translation: 我来这里是来处理我的私事的。即使我给你解释了你也不会理解的.

original: I don't know why anyone would bother with this shithole. It's filled with a bunch of disgusting inbreds and half-crazed loons.
translation: 我不明白为什么这些家伙都这么在意这个屎洞一般的地方。那不过是一个充满恶心的傻子和半疯的狂人的地方罢了。

original: I'm gonna do what I came to do, and then get the fuck out of here.
translation: 我来这里有我的目的，达成后我他妈的就离开这里。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一个被侵透的海滩叫望海崖。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富、权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: And sorry, but I don't do group trips. If you want to see Point Lookout, you'll have to leave your friend here.
translation: 并且很抱歉，我不喜欢组队旅行。如果你打算去望海崖，你需要把你的朋友留在这里。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一个被侵透的海滩叫望海崖。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的遗址，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富，权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: Down south, this side of the bay, there's a soggy strand of beach called Point Lookout.
translation: 在南边，海湾的这边，那里有一个被侵透的海滩叫望海崖。

original: Oh, it's got it all. Ruins of ancient pleasure towns, mysterious swamps bristling with treasure, and all practically untouched by outsiders.
translation: 哦，这里什么都有啊。镇子的废墟，充满宝物的神秘沼泽，并且几乎都没有被外界玷污过。无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富，权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: But if you're curious, I could offer you a ride over to that faraway land. For a nominal fee, of course.
translation: 但是如果你好奇的话，我可以把你载到那个遥远的地方，当然了，只要花一点小钱。

original: You're staring at it, friend! Drink it in!
translation: 你在盯着他瞧，朋友！喝掉它！

original: See the glorious boardwalk, fabled pleasure-town of the sunny past! And beyond it lies the haunted swamplands. Who knows what's hidden in them?
translation: 看看这光辉的栈道，传说中的欢乐之镇，让你仿佛置身于阳光明媚的美好时光！而不远处就是那遭到诅咒的沼泽。谁知道这里有什么秘密呢？

original: But while you get your bearings, my friend runs an excellent supply shop right here, near the boardwalk.
translation: 趁着你身上带着这些东西的时候，去我朋友那里看看吧，我朋友在栈道那里经营一家商店。很显然，无论找到什么都能给人带来巨大的财富、权利或者是吹牛的筹码。

original: Only that it's where Tobar gets those Punga Fruits he sells off. Must be making a good profit off of them, too.
translation: 托巴都是从那里搞到膨葛的。他肯定靠这个得到不少好处。

original: I hear rumors the place is full of swamps and killer plants, but I don't know about all that.
translation: 谣传说那里到处都是沼泽和杀人植物，但是具体情况我就不清楚了。

original: Do you know anything about Point Lookout?
translation: 你知道什么关于望海崖的事吗？

original: Where did the Punga Fruit come from?
Good stuff, isn't it? Actual, healthy food, grown in the actual ground and everything!
translation: 好东西不是吗？实际上啊，这可是健康食品，这可是在土里面长的哦！

original: There's a few places out in the Point where it grows naturally. One group of Tribals have cultivated and refined it, but they're not big on sharing.
translation: 在望海崖附近地区，有野生的这种果子。有这么一个部族耕种并培育这种东西，但是量不大，不足以与外人分享。

original: Don't even ask how I get my hands on the refined crop. A magician never reveals his secrets, does he?
translation: 不要问我是从哪里搞来的这些植物的。魔法师从来不会揭穿自己魔法的秘密，不是吗？

original: Punga grows strong. I help Punga grow stronger.
translation: 膨葛长得很茂盛。我帮助膨葛长得更加茂盛。

original: Punga understands me. I understand Punga.
translation: 膨葛理解我，我理解膨葛。

original: That is all it needs to be.
How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

original: Are you kidding? Why wouldn't we? As much as we want to reject earthly desires, we still need to eat, right?
translation: 你开玩笑吗？为什么不呢？即使我们抛弃对尘世的渴望，但是我还们还是需要吃东西的啊，不是吗？

original: It grows fast, fills you up, and you can make a lot of things with it.
translation: 它长得很快，能填饱你的肚子，也可以拿来做很多的东西。

original: Anything it doesn't provide, we can get by trading it to outsiders. That shifty bastard Tobar's always looking to buy more from us.
translation: 它不能提供给我们的东西，就需要我们去从外来者那里购买。那个叫托巴尔的混蛋总是想赚我们一笔。

original: Why do you grow so much Punga here?
translation: 你为什么要种那么多的膨葛？

original: It is a gift from the earth itself, in acknowledgement of our perfect balance with nature and the higher planes.
translation: 这是大地的馈赠，是对于我们与大自然和更高的层次实现完美平衡的奖励。

original: She recognizes that we seek to leave behind the corrupt physical, and she nurtures us in our quest.
translation: 她对我们抛弃身上腐朽废物的做法非常认可，并在我们的征途中给我们以指导。

original: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

original: Tell the truth, I got no idea. Ground's probably pretty fertile here, on account of the graveyard.
translation: 告诉你说，我完全不知道。这里的土地之所以很富饶，我估计跟那个墓地有关。

original: Plus, we got lots of people tending the gardens. Especially the big man, Croatoa.
translation: 此外，我们有很多人都在照料那个花园。特别是那位大人，克罗托亚。

original: Guy's got a knack for plants. Makes sense - mentally, they're on the same level.
translation: 他对如何照料植物有自己的敲门。挺管用的 - 也就是心理作用吧，大家的水平其实都差不多。

original: How do you get so much Punga Fruit to grow here?
translation: 你怎么搞到那么多膨葛种在这里的？

original: Please step inside, agent. Extraction details can be found on the terminal inside.
translation: 请进，特工。您将会在里面的终端找到详细信息。

original: Clearance acknowledged. Follow me for your extraction debriefing, Comrade.
translation: 得到许可。请随我来做任务情况汇报，同志。

original: So? It's smoke. Things burn down all the time. Especially around me.
translation: 那么？这不过是烟而已。每时每刻都有东西烧着，尤其在我周围。

original: Oh, it's smoke, all right. Where there's smoke, there's fire - and where there's fire, there's profit to be made selling an extinguisher!
translation: 噢，是烟，好吧。哪儿有烟，哪儿就有火 — 哪儿有火，哪儿就有兜售灭火器的机会！

original: That smoke's coming from old Calvert Mansion. I always heard it was haunted, but more importantly, I always heard it was full of pre-war treasure!
translation: 烟从老卡尔弗特公馆出来。我一直听说那儿闹鬼，但更重要的是，总听到那里满是战前宝藏！

original: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
translation: 我知道我说过望海崖是财宝猎人的圣地，但现在能有那么个灯塔很稀奇了！

original: Should I be worried? What's over there?
translation: 我应该担心吗？那儿有什么？

original: Oh, nothing much. Just old Calvert Mansion.
translation: 没什么。就是老卡尔弗特公馆。

original: Just a huge, abandoned estate teaming with who knows what opportunities for profitable scavenging. Y'know, nothing much.
translation: 只是做不知道有没有搜刮价值的巨大废弃的地产而已。你知道，仅此而已。

original: I know I said Point Lookout was perfect for treasure hunters, but it's a rare day when you get a beacon like that!
translation: 我知道我说过望海崖是财宝猎人的圣地，但现在能有那么个灯塔很稀奇了！

original: I have a house in MEGATON?TENPENNY?. Do you know Tobar?
translation: 我有一间房子。核弹镇？特配尼？你知道托巴尔么？

original: You're not safe here. Let me put a roof over your head.
translation: 你在这里不安全。让我来保护你吧。

original: We'll have loads of fun.  I promise!
translation: 我们会很快乐的，我保证！

original: Haha, just kidding! Boy, I had you going, too.
translation: 哈哈，我是开玩笑的！孩子，我会把你也带着的。

original: Kenny, would you like to come live with me?
translation: 肯尼，你愿意跟我一起走么？

original: Anybody ever say you talk too much?
translation: 有人见过你说这么多话吗？

original: Sure. I was getting tired of that anyway.
translation: 当然，不管怎么说我也对那感到厌倦了。

original: How do you survive in here all alone?
translation: 你是怎么一个人在这种地方活下来的？

original: I go out to play some days and might bag me a shellman to eat. Most days I just sit here with my stories and toys, though.
translation: 我有时候出去玩，也许还会要点果仁吃。大多数时候我只会坐在这里玩我的玩具，讲我自己的故事。

original: Why are you hiding down here?
Swamp Folk know Ol' Herzog's Mine-hole. Say it's haunted. So I knew most folk wouldn't wander this way, except outsiders like you.
translation: 住在沼泽的人都知道赫尔佐格的那个矿洞。传闻说里面闹鬼。所以说住在这里的人都不会去靠近的，除了像你这样的外来者。

original: Doesn't usually take more than a clapper-jaw on the leg to scare them off.
translation: 想要吓走他们恐怕不会很容易吧。

original: Tell me about Old Man Herzog.
translation: 告诉我关于老赫尔佐格的事情。

original: He was a mean old man, owned this mine a million years ago. Made the miners work real hard and didn't give them any money or food for their kin.
translation: 他是个非常小气的老家伙，很多年前就获得了这矿井的所有权。他对矿工很苛刻，逼着矿工干很多活，但是又不给他们工钱或者食物。

original: One day a bunch of miners sat down and just stopped working. Old man Herzog, he didn't like that. Not a bit.
translation: 有一次，一些矿工停下手里的活坐下来休息。那个老家伙赫尔佐格，不喜欢那些矿工这样做，一点也不。

original: So, he blew them all up! With a million-million tons of dynamite!
translation: 所以他就把他们都炸飞了！用了好多好多炸药！

original: No one wanted to work in the mine after that. Then Ol' Herzog came down here and hung himself.
translation: 自从那以后，就没有人为他工作了。然后他就一个人来到了这里。

original: They say his angry ghost still haunts the mine. That doesn't scare me, though.
translation: 他们说那个生气的幽灵经常在矿井附近出没。不过我并不害怕。

original: What's it like living in Point Lookout?
translation: 在望海崖生活是什么样的?

original: The grownups like my mama and pop just live in the wet. They're okay, they just don't trust outsiders like you.
translation: 像我妈妈爸爸这样的大人都只是生活在湿地。他们是好人，只是不太信任像你这样的外来者。

original: Most think I'm an outsider too, because I don't got the markings on me. I tend to stay away from the grownups.
translation: 大多数人认为为我也是个外来者，因为在我身上没有什么标示。我总是尝试远离那些大人。

original: Except when they have a campfire. Some nights I hear them dancing. Then I sneak out to watch.
translation: 除非有篝火。有时候我能听见他们在跳舞。然后我就在一旁偷看。

original: I dunno. I ran away a long time ago. I live here all by myself.
translation: 我不知道。我从那里跑出来已经很久了。我一直一个人生活。

original: I already told you. I ran away. Shut up about it, all right?
translation: 我已经告诉你了。我从那里跑出来了。不要再提这件事情了，知道吗？

original: Settle down. I'm not going to hurt you.
translation: 冷静点，我不会伤害你的。

original: Well... all right. But any funny business and I'll pop you one. My name's Kenny. And I'm the boss of this mine.
translation: 嗯…好吧。但是要规矩点，否则我会给你好瞧。我叫肯尼。我是这个矿井的老大。

original: What do you mean, you weren't "born right"?
translation: 你这是什么意思？你说你 “生下来就是个错误”？

original: Look at me. I don't got the marks. I go around the wets and folk will shoot at me! Thinking I was one of your type.
translation: 看着我。我身上没有标示。我走过湿地就会有人朝我射击！想象一下我曾经就像你一样。

original: Why did you run away from home, Kenny?
translation: 你为什么要离家出走，肯尼?

original: I wasn't born right.  Mama hid me in the basement and pappy kinda just forgot about me, but I knew I had to go before I grew up.
translation: 我生得不是时候。妈妈把我藏在地下室，爸爸好像是把我忘了一样，但是我知道我要在我长大之前离开这里。
告诉我关于你的事，肯尼。

original: Did you know I once bagged a Mirelurk ten feet tall?
translation: 你知道我曾经搞到过一个10英尺高的泥沼蟹吗？

original: I bet you can't beat me in a race. You look reeeal slow.
translation: 我敢打赌你跑得肯定没有我快。你看起来真的很慢。

original: This one time I'm pretty sure I moved a bottle with my mind...
translation: 这一次我确信我用精神力量移动了瓶子…

original: I bet I can burp louder than you!
translation: 我敢打赌我打嗝的声音比你大！

original: Cut the crap, kid. That light show isn't scaring anybody.
translation: 废话少说，小子。这光线不会伤害任何人。

original: No, I mean it, mister. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
translation: 不，我是认真的，先生。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！

original: No, I mean it, lady. The ghost will melt your brain to mush! You need to get out here. And fast!
translation: 不，我是认真的，女士。那僵尸会把你的大脑变成玉米粥！你必须赶快离开这里。要快！

original: Ghost? Where? We'd better get out of here!
translation: 僵尸？在哪？我们最好离开这儿。

original: Yeah, you'd better scram - if he looks you in the eyes, your brain will melt!
translation: 是啊，你最好快跑 - 如果你与他的双眼对视，你的大脑就会被溶化！

original: So the traps and noises, that was all you?
translation: 那么，这些陷阱和声音都是你弄出来的？

original: So what if it was? I've bagged meaner than you, and I'll do it again!
translation: 如果是真的又怎么样？我抢的比你要多得多，让我再来一次也没关系！

original: Come over here, boy. Let's talk.
Come over here, girl. Let's talk.
I had something I wanted to ask you...
At last! Our game is ending!
translation: 终于！我们的游戏要结束了！

original: Why did you attack the mansion?
Damned if I know. It was abandoned when I got here.
translation: 该死，我根本就不知道。在我来这里之前那里就被遗弃了。

original: There's plenty hidden away here, none of it would be useful to to a bunch of crazed inbreds.
translation: 这里有很多的隐蔽通道，不过对于那些疯狂的蠢蛋，这些都毫无意义。

original: Why would they want to attack the mansion?
translation: 他们为什么想要攻击这公馆？

original: Our most enlightened one divined that the fates themselves did decree the mansion must be burnt to the ground!
translation: 我们最智慧的指引者预言说，命运早已注定了这公馆必须要被烧成灰烬。

original: Honestly? I got no idea. Word came down on high that the place had to come down.
translation: 坦白的说，我不知道。上面传下话来说那个地方要被拆掉。

original: I probably should have joined the war party, but... well, I'm not really comfortable with violence.
translation: 我本应该加入主战派的，但是…嗯，我不太习惯使用暴力解决问题。

original: Jackson said he saw its destruction in a vision. There were some concerns, but when the leader says it's a mandate from beyond, you don't ask why.
translation: 杰克逊说他看到了它的毁灭。虽然还有一些疑问和忧虑，但是如果首领说那是神谕，你就不能问为什么了。

original: That hill is holy. It must be cleared. Jackson told us this.
translation: 杰克逊跟我们说，那个小山是神圣之所，必需要被净化。

original: Some went to fight. I stayed with Punga.
translation: 有些人已经去战斗了。我留下来待在膨葛身边。

original: Punga does not fight. Punga grows where it can. Punga knows what is important.
translation: 膨葛不参加战斗。膨葛尽可能得到处生长。膨葛知道什么是重要的。

original: We take no pleasure in violence. Our goal was merely to remove the ghoul. His presence is an offense to the Transcendent Master's astral dominion.
translation: 我们不喜欢用暴力解决问题。我们的目标仅仅是除掉那个僵尸。他的出现是对我们至高无上主人的星之领土的冒犯。

original: I cannot claim to understand the exact reasons that the mansion's resident caused such disruption, however. To understand fully, ask the Master.
translation: 公馆里的居民造成如此破坏的具体原因我并不清楚。如果想知道的话，你应该去找主人。

original: Of course I did, but that moron thought it was one of his addled visions. The real goal was to destroy the ghouls' jamming device!
translation: 当然了。但是那个傻子还以为是他那愚蠢的“神谕”呢。实际上，真正的目的是去摧毁僵尸的干扰设施。

original: Honestly, those fools aren't worth the meat they're made of. A minion that can't follow directions is no use at all!
translation: 坦白地说，那些傻子一点存在的价值都没有。奴才要是不听话，那就一点用都没有！

original: Did you tell the Tribals to attack the mansion?
translation: 是你下令让部落攻击这公馆的吗？

original: Woah, woah, woah! That was all Jackson's crazy idea. I knew better than to volunteer for that suicide mission!
translation: 哇哦，哇哦，哇哦！这很显然是杰克逊出的疯狂的主意。这种自愿去送死的做法，我一眼就能看出来。

original: Last time I wandered too close to that mansion, some old ghoul sicced his dogs on me. Screw that!
translation: 有一次我打算接近那公馆，结果有些老僵尸竟然把狗放出来咬我。去他娘的！

original: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
translation: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？

original: What do you know about the Tribals?
translation: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

original: They're brainless morons who worship some crazy spirit. What's to know?
translation: 他们都是些没大脑的白痴，崇拜着某个疯狂的灵魂。但是知道到底怎么回事呢？

original: What do you know about the Tribals?
translation: 你知道什么关于部落的事情吗？

original: We espouse the expansion of the perfect mind, and the rejection of the corrupt physical!
translation: 我们崇尚对完美思想的延伸和对腐朽肉体的拒绝。

original: The material world is destroyed and imperfect. We seek to release our minds from their tainted cages, so as to find a better world.
translation: 我们的物质世界已经分崩离析，并且也十分的不完美。我们在寻找并且传播我们的理念，好让人们从他们的枷锁中得到解放，我们要把这个世界变得更美好。

original: What does this tribe believe in?
We're all about expansion of the mind, denying the physical, all that good stuff.
translation: 我们都在扩展着我们的思想，鄙弃我们的肉体以及其他。

original: I mean, have you looked around? This world sucks the big fat one, so we're ditching it and going off to fantasyland.
translation: 我的意思是，你看到你的周围了么？核弹摧残着这个世界，所以我们要抛弃它，去追寻梦想的天堂。

original: Only, not imaginary fantasyland. Real fantasyland, right? A world of perfect thought. Anywhere but this shithole, at least.
translation: 只是，不是什么幻想世界，而是真正的梦想世界，对么？一个充满着完美想法的世界。不管它在哪，它绝不会在这个糟糕的洞穴里。

original: What does this tribe believe in?
I'm denmother. I keep us safe and make sure everyone remembers to eat and sleep. It's more work than you might think.
translation: 我是洞穴之母。我保证大家的安全，并且确保每个人都记得吃东西，去睡觉。这工作比你想象的要辛苦得多。

original: A lot of our members have... "transcended conscious thought." Someone's got to take care of them.
translation: 我们许多成员都有…“超脱神智的思维”。需要某些人来照顾他们。

original: What do you do in this tribe?
translation: 你在这个部落里做什么？

original: We dream. Dream of a better world, not falling apart like ours.
translation: 我们梦想着。梦想身处在一个美好的世界里，而不是这个分崩离析的地方。

original: And when we find a dream that makes us forget this world, we dream that we do not have to wake up.
translation: 并且当我们找到了那个梦想世界的时候我们就忘掉这个世界，我们梦想着自己不需要醒来。

original: We are a family of dreamers, a band of astral explorers, and a church of the mind.
translation: 我们梦想之人是一个大家庭，是一群星界的旅行者，是思想的教堂。

original: In time, we will be free of the horrors of the base physical world. We will play amongst the pure thoughts of the universe!
translation: 迟早，我们要从这个以物质为基础的世界里解脱。我们要在宇宙里的纯粹的思想世界里畅游。

original: Now, hold on there. Not so fuckin' fast. You can be useful to me. I need someone willing to get their hands dirty.
translation: 先等等。现在还不他妈的是时候。你能帮上我的忙。我需要个愿意干脏活的人。

original: So, here's the deal: I help you get in with those Tribals, you help me get what I want, and I'll make you fuckin' rich.
translation: 所以说，我们需要达成一个交易：我帮你解决那些部落造成的问题，你帮我得到我想要的东西，我就可以把你变成他妈的富翁了。

original: Just try not to sprain a lobe while you're thinking about it. My time is short.
translation: 在你考虑的时候可要小心别扭伤了你的脑子。我没那么多闲工夫。

original: Any chance of getting more training?
translation: 有什么得到更多训练的机会么？

original: Oh, there's always a chance, certainly. But what you earn depends on how well you can follow directions.
translation: 哦，当然了，机会总是有的。但是你能获得什么，要取决于你在多大程度上服从于我的命令了。

original: You're not the most incompetent waster I've ever met. I think we could put you to work and figure out what's going on here.
translation: 你并不是我见过最无能的废物。我想，这里有点工作需要你去做，并且看看这里到底放生了什么事情。

original: Your reward would be considerable, since I know that's what you wasters value. Decide.
translation: 我发现你这个垃圾有点价值吗，我会考虑关于奖励的问题的。 决定吧。

original: What kind of failsafe are you talking about?
translation: 你说的安全故障是什么东西？

original: Do you know why the Tribals were attacking?
translation: 你知道那部落为什么要发动攻击么？

original: Not a fuckin' clue. It'd be easy to chalk it up to their crazy religion, but if I'm right, and I always am, there's something else going on.
translation: 一点他妈的线索都没有。但是仍然很容易就能联系到这与他们该死的疯狂的宗教有关，如果我的猜测是对的话，当然了，我的猜测总是对的，他们肯定在谋划着什么。

original: That's the third attack in a month, so somebody's got a grudge with me. Whether it's a man or a god, I intend to set them straight.
translation: 这已经是这个月第三次袭击了，所以，这看起来有人对我充满了怨恨。不管这背后是人还是神的指使，我都要跟他们算算账。

original: Why are they attacking? Can't we reason with them?
translation: 他们为什么要发起攻击？不能跟他们讲道理么？

original: Who are you? How do I know I can trust you?
translation: 你是谁？我怎么知道你不会害我？

original: Like I'm taking orders from you, pipsqueak.
translation: 看来我要听命于你这小鬼。

original: How does Professor Calvert control the Tribals?
translation: 卡尔弗特教授是怎么控制部落的？

original: You saw it. He uses his device to talk to their soft-headed leader in those caves. They think he's a fuckin' god, and they do what he wants.
translation: 你看见了。他使用了某种装置在洞穴里跟他们的蠢蛋领袖交流。他们以为他是他妈个神，便任由他使唤。

original: The blighters are too stupid to get it right most of the time. But, seeing as how they figured to attack me here, Calvert is getting close.
translation: 那些家伙太愚蠢了，命令他们办事可不容易。不过，他们既然能到这来袭击我，看来卡尔弗特就快成功了。

original: But if their "god" goes silent, then they won't be a problem anymore, now will they?
translation: 但如果他们的“神”沉默了，那他们就不再有威胁了，是吧？

original: What does the Cogwave Jammer do?
At some point, Professor Calvert developed the ability to speak inside people's heads. Problem is, he's not so good at it.
translation: 从某种角度讲，卡尔弗特教授发展出一种建立在人脑中通话能力。问题是，他还不能很好地驾驭这种能力。

original: He's using something to boost his power and talk to those Tribal simps. The fools think he's God or something.
translation: 他用某种东西加强了与部落白痴们的交流。那些傻瓜以为他是神之类的。

original: Once I jam up his signal, he won't be able to get them to do what he wants, and I'll be able to find where the little fuck is hiding.
translation: 一旦我阻断他的信号，他就无法随心所欲的操纵部落了，而这个时候我就能找到那个小杂种的藏身处。

original: What do you need me to do again?
translation: 你接下来还想要我干嘛？

original: Were you not paying attention? I need you to take that Cogwave Jammer over to the Ferris wheel by the docks.
translation: 你没听见吗？把脑波干扰器带到码头边的摩天轮那里。

original: Attach it to one of the cars, then raise it as high as it will go.
translation: 装到一个客厢上，再转到最高点。

original: That's the only way we'll be able to shut off the Professor's ability to talk to those simple bastards who work for him.
translation: 教授能跟那些弱智混蛋进行通话，从而来操控他们。只用通过这个我们才能阻止他们的通话。

original: Well, that's just too bad, ain't it? But since you're so afraid, attach the thing to one of the cars and then spin it around to get it to the top.
translation: 喔，那太糟了，不是吗？但既然你这么害怕，那就随便装到一个客厢上，再转到高处。

original: I'll watch from here and turn it on when it's ready. Then we'll see where our little Professor is.
translation: 我就从这里观察，就绪了便开启开关。然后就能知道咱们的小教授在哪了。

original: That big wheel down by the docks, right?
translation: 港口下面的巨轮，没错吧？

original: Right. Attach it to the bottom car, then turn it on and spin the jammer to the top. No fuckin' problem.
translation: 没错。装到最下面的客厢上，开启开关，把干扰器转到最高处。绝对他妈的没问题。

original: I'll watch from here and turn it on. Then we'll see where our little professor is.
translation: 我就从这里观察并开启开关。然后就能知道咱们的小教授在哪了。

original: So, how do we shut him down?
If I know the Professor, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
translation: 要说我了解教授的话，他肯定正用一种高频感知正弦广播。

original: I have the perfect device to jam up that little worm's talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point around and install it.
translation: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。

original: If I know Professor Calvert, and I do, he's using a high frequency cognitive sine broadcast.
translation: 要说我了解卡尔弗特教授的话，我确实了解他，他在用一种高频感知正弦广播。

original: I have the perfect device to jam up his little talkbox. All you need to do is take it to the highest point on the shore and install it.
translation: 我有个绝佳的装置来干扰他那小小的发音盒。你要做的就是将其带到海滩上的最高点并安置好。

original: Oh, I can't wait to hear this.
translation: 哦，我都已经等不及要听听了。

original: So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to them.
translation: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。

original: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
translation: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。

original: So, we cut off his ability to talk to them, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
translation: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！

original: What do you want me to do?
So, those half-wits are getting messages from the Professor, right? So, he's off somewhere broadcasting to 'em.
translation: 那些智障在接受教授的信息，对吗？所以他肯定从某处发出了信号。

original: But without those buggers to do things for him, he can't do much for himself.
translation: 一旦离开这些为他卖命的混蛋，他自己就没什么能耐了。

original: So, we cut off his ability to talk to 'em, and he'll need to try harder. Maybe then I can find the squishy little worm and finish him off for good!
translation: 所以我们废掉他们相互交谈的能力，他就有麻烦了。或许我们就能找到这个软黏黏的蠕虫，永远除掉他！

original: There'd better be something good at the end of this.
Nothing but the best for people who stay in my good graces. Now, you ready to stop whining and listen?
translation: 我决不会亏待我所赏识的人。现在，你能闭上臭嘴听我说两句吗？

original: Right, right. You're mean, we get it.
translation: 是的，没错。我们都看出来了，你很小气。

original: You're goddamn right, I am. Now, let's get on with the work, shall we?
translation: 太他妈正确了，这就是我。现在，咱们开始干正事吧，好吗？

original: Maybe you should watch your tone, old man.
Or what? You think I haven't been shot before? Think that you, over the thousands who have tried, can take me down?
translation: 你想怎样？你以为我没中过枪吗？无数的人都想要我的命，你以为你能行？

original: You'd best wise the hell up and play along. I'll get what I want, and you'll get rich, and then we can go about our separate goddamn ways.
translation: 你最好放聪明点，乖乖听我的。我拿到我想要的，你也会得到报酬，然后我们就能他妈的分道扬镳了。

original: So, now you want me to do something else, right?
translation: 那么，你现在想让我干点什么，是么？

original: Of course I fucking want you to do something else. You don't expect me to trod around this mudhole my self, do you?
translation: 我他妈当然想让你干点别的。你难道以为我会自己踩进泥坑里磕磕绊绊？

original: You know this guy? What's going on here?
translation: 你认识这家伙么？这里是怎么回事？

original: Calvert is my old rival. Centuries, we've played this game. I knew he'd be stupid enough to hide so close to his family home.
translation: 卡尔弗特是我的老冤家。几世纪以来，我们一直在玩游戏。我就知道他会藏在离家这么近的地方，只有他这么蠢。

original: It's not a matter of hate, it's a matter of destiny. He is my enemy, and I do not suffer any bastard who opposes me to live.
translation: 这无关恨，只是宿命。他是我的敌人，我不能容忍任何反抗我的杂种活着。

original: I knew he was here, and it is my intent to find him, and call down a righteous fucking hammer on his head.
translation: 我就知道他在这儿，我只是想找到他，让上帝把那该死的正义锤子砸在他脑袋上。
只是夸张了点。他的脑袋。

original: So, who is this brain thing, anyway?
translation: 那么，这个教授到底是谁？

original: HIM! I should have known. My old rival... so close to his family home. Only he would be so stupid.
translation: 是他！我早该知道。我的老冤家…离他的老家如此之近。只有他才会这么傻。

original: He was once a man -- Professor Calvert. The Calverts owned half of Maryland, back when there was a Maryland to own.
translation: 他曾是卡尔弗特教授 — 在他还有人样的时候。那时候马里兰州还存在，卡尔弗特家族则拥有半个马里兰州。

original: Members of the Calvert family were influential all over the world. They practically owned a deed to the US government.
translation: 卡尔弗特的家族成员在全球都极富影响力。实际上他们在美国政府大有势力。

original: In their best days, there were no less than three Calvert family senators, seven members of the house, and two governors.
translation: 在最辉煌的日子，卡尔弗特家族有至少三名参议员、七名众议员和两名州长。

original: They even had a top candiate for president, until that scandal with the dog forced him to drop out of the race. I was particularly proud of that one.
translation: 他们甚至有过最有希望的总统候选人，直到与狗的丑闻迫使他们放弃了竞选。我对此感到分外自豪。

original: Nice curtains. Could you try not to bleed on them when I kill you?
translation: 真是漂亮的窗帘啊。我可不想你的血弄脏了这些窗帘，能配合下吗？

original: Tough, are you? Good, I might have use for that. Come, let's talk.
translation: 真狠啊，不是吗？很好，我可不那么好惹。来吧，我们谈谈。

original: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
translation: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。

original: You're in Blackhall Manor.  This isn't a tourist attraction, but I appreciate your good taste. Come, let's talk.
translation: 你身处布莱克霍尔庄园。这不是旅游胜地，但我欣赏你的品位。来吧，我们谈谈。

original: I was just admiring the architecture. I didn't mean any offense.
translation: 我只是在欣赏这建筑，没有任何恶意。
我找到你的泰迪熊了。<撒谎>

original: I... guess that's Kenny-Bear. Thanks for bringing him back.
translation: 我…猜那就是肯尼熊吧。谢谢你帮我把他带回来。

original: Okay. I'll go get it for you.
translation: 好吧，我会帮你把它搞到手的。

original: Gee, thanks!  I dropped him near the shaft, so he's probably at the bottom.
translation: 耶啊，谢谢！我把他掉进那个通风管道里了，也许你能在最底部找到。

original: I don't go back there much - it's real dark and there's lots of critters. You should be fine, though!
translation: 我不常去那里 - 因为里面太黑了，而且里面有很多吓人东西。但是你肯定能应付！

original: I'm still looking for your teddy bear.
translation: 我还在找你的泰迪熊呢。

original: Bring him back as fast as you can!
So hey. You can use this place as your hideout if you want. Hide from the folk out there. Stash your stuff. Okay?
translation: 那么，嘿。如果你想的话你可以把这里当做你的藏身之处。藏起来不被外面那些家伙发现。存放你的东西。好吗？

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Well, I certainly can do one thing that you can't: I can fucking well walk!
translation: 有件事你不能做而我能：我他妈能好好走路！

original: And you! Always with empty fucking threats and meaningless drivel, but never the will to act!
translation: 而你！他妈的只会耍嘴皮子吓唬别人，整天胡言乱语，但从不付之行动！

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Well, I certainly can do one thing that you can't: I can fucking well walk!
translation: 有件事你不能做而我能：我他妈能好好走路！

original: And you! Always with empty fucking threats and meaningless drivel, but never the will to act!
translation: 而你！他妈的只会耍嘴皮子吓唬别人，整天胡言乱语，但从不付之行动！

original: No, Calvert! I brought someone with me, someone very special. This stranger tricked you into letting me find where you were hiding.
translation: 不，卡尔弗特！我有个很特别的帮手。全靠这位陌生人略施小计，我才能找到你的藏身之处。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: So vulgar, Mister Lockheart! After all this time, you still haven't learned to expand your vocabulary! Fool!
translation: 这太粗俗了，洛克哈特先生！事隔这么久，你还是没能扩展你的词汇！蠢货！

original: Your words mean nothing to me, Mr. Lockheart. You are a foolish and vulgar man, incapable of the slightest forethought!
translation: 你的话对我毫无意义，洛克哈特先生。你是个愚蠢粗俗的人，没有一点深谋远虑。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: So vulgar, Mister Lockheart! After all this time, you still haven't learned to expand your vocabulary! Fool!
translation: 这太粗俗了，洛克哈特先生！事隔这么久，你还是没能扩展你的词汇！蠢货！

original: Your words mean nothing to me, Mr. Lockheart. You are a foolish and vulgar man, incapable of the slightest forethought!
translation: 你的话对我毫无意义，洛克哈特先生。你是个愚蠢粗俗的人，没有一点深谋远虑。

original: Ah yes, Mister Lockheart. At last we meet, face to jar. But I'm afraid that at the end of this, it is you who will meet his end.
translation: 是的，洛克哈特先生。我们终于见面了。但恐怕最终见到末日的会是你。

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！
你这个没实体而可悲的小脑！
你这个恶心滑腻的混蛋，还没头盖骨！

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！
你这个没实体而可悲的小脑！
你这个恶心滑腻的混蛋，还没头盖骨！

original: There you are, you slippery bastard! At last! Let's end this, here and now!
translation: 终于逮到你了，你这狡猾的混蛋！终于！就在这里，做个了断吧！

original: Tell me more about this Book that's so important.
translation: 告诉我更多关于那本书的事，这很重要。

original: Obadiah's a good man, but his family has an evil past. This book is an unwanted heirloom, and the foundation of the heathen Krvibi ritualists.
translation: 奥巴迪亚是个好人，但他的家庭有着邪恶的过去。这本书是不义的传家宝，野蛮的卡维碧仪式的基石。

original: What should I be doing again?
I told you about their ritual site, remember? See if they're hiding the book there and bring it back to me. From there?  I don't yet know.
translation: 我跟你说过他们的仪式场所，记得吗？看看他们有没有把书藏在那儿，有的话带回来？我可说不好。

original: Can we discuss the Blackhall situation?
translation: 我们能谈谈布莱克霍尔的情况么？

original: I fear Obadiah is in dire straits. What do you want to talk about?
translation: 恐怕奥巴迪亚状况不妙。你想谈什么？

original: Not much of a housekeeper, are you?
translation: 你不止是个管家吧，对吗？

original: Did it work? Is the ritual complete?
translation: 这管用么？仪式完成了么？

original: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
translation: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened sister!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！

original: For a time, we feared your mind had journeyed too far from your body, and you had departed our world. But you returned to us again, at long last!
translation: 有那么一阵，我们都怕你的意识游离于躯体太远，你已经离开了我们的世界。但你还是回来了，姗姗来迟！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened brother!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！

original: You're still going to be like that, huh? I suppose it was too much to hope that transcendental enlightenment had taught you some manners.
translation: 你还是会像那样做，哼？我想我我对超脱的启迪能教你些礼貌抱太高的期望了。

original: Oh well, you'll learn some humility eventually, even if Woodrose has to beat it into you.
translation: 好吧，你最终还是会学会的有些人性，即便银背藤要对你强行灌输。

original: Just get inside the sacred cathedral. You're enlightened now, so try to act like it, okay?
translation: 进神圣大教堂去吧。你已经开化了，表现得像样点，好吗？

original: You again? Why couldn't I hallucinate someone who's not a moron?
translation: 又是你？我的幻觉里面为什么就不能出现一个智力正常的家伙呢！

original: What happened to me? Why does my head hurt so much?
translation: 我怎么了？我的头怎么那么疼？

original: That is merely the sensation of your consciousness rushing to embrace its true potential. It is the feeling of having no boundaries. No limits!
translation: 那只是你那急于揭开真正潜力的意识的感受。那是没有边界，没有极限的感受！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened sister!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的姐妹！

original: That is merely the sensation of your consciousness rushing to embrace its true potential. It is the feeling of having no boundaries. No limits!
translation: 那只是你那急于揭开真正潜力的意识的感受。那是没有边界，没有极限的感受！

original: Yea, though your body will bear the scars of the ritual, your soul shall be forever strengthened by the experience!
translation: 是的，虽然你的身上会留下仪式的疤痕，但你的灵魂将因这经历而永远强化！

original: You are now welcomed in our cathedral. Enter, enlightened brother!
translation: 现在你可以进入我们的大教堂了。请进，开化的兄弟！

original: Sure. Do some crazy ritual. Whatever.
translation: 当然，做一些神经兮兮的仪式，等等。

original: Okay, be that way. It's called the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Laugh if you want, but it will open your mind to the world!
translation: 好，就那样吧。这叫做母亲之种仪式。想笑就笑吧，但它能解放你的思想！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect its seeds, and you will be welcome in the tribe. Then you shall learn the true wisdom of our ways!
translation: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。

original: You really think they'll just let me in like that?
translation: 你真的认为他们会就这样让我进去？

original: These are people who think cutting a hole in their skull can expand their mind. They're not exactly scholars over there.
translation: 他们是群想着在脑袋上开个洞来扩展思想的人。他们可不是什么知识分子。

original: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
translation: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。

original: I just need information. No need for violence... yet.
translation: 我需要信息。不需要暴力…就目前来说。

original: What, like you've never done something unpleasant for the promise of your own personal gain? Give it a rest, saint.
translation: 什么，你这么说就好像是你从来都没因为自己的私利而作过不好的事情一样？你算了吧，圣人。

original: Just head up to the Cathedral and ask real nice. When you're in, you find the bastard in charge and find out what they're up to.
translation: 去大教堂好好问问。你进去以后，去找那个混蛋管事的，看看到底发生了什么事。

original: I just need information. No need for violence... yet.
translation: 我需要信息。不需要暴力…就目前来说。

original: Sorry, but that's not really an option. I was only being polite in pretending that it was.
translation: 很抱歉，但是那并不是一个选择。只是出于礼貌我才说它是。

original: Tell you what, take a while and roll it around in your tiny brain. Consider your other options, if you think you've got any.
translation: 告诉你吧，用你的小脑袋好好想一想。考虑一下你的另一个选择，当然了，假如你还能再想出来一个的话。

original: What sort of reward are you offering?
The only reliable currency in the world: information. You provide me with valuable info about the Tribals, I pay in kind.
translation: 这个世界上最可靠的货币：信息。如果你能提供我一些关于部落有价值的信息，那么你将获得很好的报酬。

original: I've got a few more tricks I can share with you, if that's not enough to get you barking.
translation: 如果这还不够让你叫唤的话，我还有一些小把戏可以与你分享，

original: Okay, but how can I infiltrate them?
translation: 好吧，但我怎么混进他们中间去呢？

original: Easy-peasy, right about now they'll be wondering what happened to their hunting party.
translation: 相当容易，这样一来他们就会想要知道，他们的狩猎小队出了什么事。

original: You need to learn to pay attention when I speak.
translation: 当我说话的时候你要注意听。

original: Those mud-lovers want me dead, and haven't extended the common fucking courtesy of telling me why.
translation: 那些玩泥的家伙想要我死，并且还不不能指望他们像正常人一样告诉我为什么要杀死我。

original: So I need you to find a way into their commune and figure out what's going through their addled little heads.
translation: 我需要你跟他们混熟，并且从他们的愚蠢的小脑袋里面找出他们在想些什么。

original: Be a good pup, and Ol' Desmond will give you a treat. And, of course, who knows what riches they have for you to steal?
translation: 乖乖听话，老德斯蒙德会好好地招待你的。当然了，谁知道他们有什么好东西值得你去偷呢?

original: What do you want me to do about the Tribals?
translation: 关于那部落，你想让我做什么？

original: What? Do you have to make some sort of tea out of magic beans, or play a song for their lizard king?
translation: 什么？你打算从那个神奇的豆子里搞出点茶来还是说你打算去给他们的蜥蜴国王唱首歌啊?

original: Please. They're a pack of religious nutballs. Grow a pair and just go through the motions. Anyone with a brain knows that it's all bullshit.
translation: 求求你了。那些都不过是宗教性质的歪理邪说。有点风吹草动就把事情带有感情地夸大到不行。有点大脑的人就会明白那些都是胡扯。

original: The Tribals want me to do some ritual before they'll let me in.
translation: 那部落要我举行某种仪式才可以进去。

original: Oh, okay. Verily, I shall taketh your test. And I shall, um, succeedeth!
translation: 哦，好吧。事实上，我会接受你的测试，而且，我会，嗯…成功的！

original: Much better! Ahem... Wisely spoken, initiate! Your dedication and, um, flexibility shall serve you well in the Ritual of the Mother Seed!
translation: 好多了！咳咳……说得真好，新人！你的献身精神和，呃，灵活性将在母亲之种仪式中为你所用！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。

original: I'm not so sure about this. Tell me more.
translation: 我对这个不是很确定。多告诉我一些吧。

original: Your caution is a credit to your wisdom - only a fool eats before he knows the meal. You are worthy to attempt the Ritual of the Mother Seed!
translation: 你的谨慎是你智慧的证明—只有傻瓜才会吃不了解的东西。你值得尝试母亲之种仪式！

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。

original: I have no fear. I will take your test, and I will be victorious!
translation: 我没有恐惧。我会接受你的测验，而且我一定会获胜！

original: You may not be so brave when you face the Ritual of the Mother Seed. Stronger souls than you have attempted it and lost their minds.
translation: 当你面对母亲之种仪式时，可能就不会这么勇敢了。更强大的的人也已经尝试过，但都丢失了自己的意识。

original: Venture west to the great bog, and within you shall find the mother of all Punga Fruit. She stands taller than a man, and her vines guide our future.
translation: 去西边的大沼泽冒险吧，在那儿你会找到所有膨葛果的母亲。她比人更高，她的藤蔓指引我们的未来。

original: Collect her seeds, and kneel before her wisdom. Only then will you be ready to enter these sacred halls.
translation: 收集它的种子，你才会受到部落的欢迎。只有那样，你才能学到我们真正的智慧。

original: Seriously? "The threshold of transcendence"? Just let me in, already.
translation: 当真？“无我之境”？让我进去就好。

original: What? No, you're doing it wrong! If you want to join, you're supposed to get into the right mindset, you know?
translation: 什么？不，你做错了！如果你想加入，你应该进入正确的精神状态，明白吗？

original: We don't just take any recruit, either. You've got to be willing to see the world a different way. You may not understand, but it's important to us.
translation: 我们也不会招募任何人。你肯定愿意从不同的角度看待世界。你可能不明白，但对我们来说很重要。

original: And that means you can't get in unless you've gone through the ritual. Don't worry, it's nothing big. But it really does makes a difference.
translation: 那意味着在完成仪式前，你不能加入。别担心，没什么大不了的。但却真的会有所不同。

original: I seek the wisdom of your people. May I join your tribe?
translation: 我在寻找了你的子民的智慧。我可以加入你的部落么？

original: What's this? A humble traveler, seeking the guidance of our awakened minds? Truly, this is a glorious day!
translation: 这是什么？一位谦逊的旅行者，寻求我们苏醒意识的指引？真的，这是光荣的一天！

original: You are from far away, and must be strong indeed to have traveled this far! But strength is nothing without the guidance of the enlightened mind.
translation: 你从远方来，你确实很强壮，走了这么远的路！但没有觉醒的意识指引，力量将一无是处。

original: If you seek entry, you must be prepared to expand your consciousness. You must prove yourself worthy to transcend!
translation: 如果你在找入口，你必须准备好拓展你的意识。你必须证明自己值得超脱！

original: Nadine, your mother asked me to find you.
translation: 娜丁， 你妈妈让我来找你。

original: Look, it's not that I don't want to go home, or anything. I mean, I love my ma, even if she does make me want to claw my eyes out sometimes.
translation: 听着，事情不是这样的，并不是我不想回家。我的意思是，我爱我的母亲，虽然有时候她会逼我发狂。

original: It's just, I came out here to find a fortune. To make my mark. To be able to bring something with me when I do come back.
translation: 我来这里只不过是为了发财。我要成名。我可不想空着手回去。

original: If you see my mom again, let her know I'll be coming back, eventually. Just... not quite yet.
translation: 如果你有机会再见到我母亲，告诉她，我会回去的。只不过…不是现在。

original: Now that I've got this sweet boat? I guess I could head back home... for a while, anyway.
translation: 现在我有了这艘好船？我想我可以回家……一段时间，就这样。

original: Just wait 'till mom sees the haul I'm bringing home!
translation: 就等着我把这些东西带回家吧！

original: Any chance you're going home now?
They may have killed her twice. It was pretty messy.
translation: 或许她死了两次。这真她妈混乱。

original: Spare me the details, you goon.
I'm pretty sure I just saved your life, you know.
translation: 我十分确定我刚刚救了你的命，你知道的。

original: No, but you helped me out, and that's something. Can't let you think I'm not a gracious host, can I?
translation: 不，只要你帮我解决了这个问题，那不就可以了吗。我怎么可能会让你觉得我不是一个仁慈的主人呢？

original: So, tell you what I'll do, I'll share a few tips for the next time you're making a dramatic final stand.
translation: 那么，告诉我我将要做什么，我会分享一些能使你在下一次战斗中戏剧性地站到最后的技巧。

original: You round up Ghouls for slaughter? Isn't that... unethical of you?
translation: 你把那些尸鬼集中起来全杀了？你这样不是……太不道德了吗？

original: Have I tried to chew on your skull, sir? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
translation: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
translation: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: Have I tried to chew on your skull? Perhaps you've noticed my ability to string words into complete sentences?
translation: 先生，我曾经尝试过对你如此品头论足过么？也许你已经发现了我的能力是把闲言碎语组织起来？讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: These ferals are nothing like myself. I'm no more a monster for providing them than you are for slaughtering them.
translation: 我跟那些野蛮的家伙可不一样。我可不是被你屠宰的怪物。讽刺不过是将愤怒礼貌地发泄罢了。

original: What if we get overwhelmed? How do I get out?
translation: 如果我们输了怎么办？我怎么逃出去？

original: Not an option, I'm afraid. The thrill wouldn't be the same if you knew I'd release you at the first sign of trouble, now would it?
translation: 那可不行。如果在一开始就给你制造麻烦的话，那会减少乐趣的。

original: The participants - that's you - assemble in the arena. Once you've made your preparations, signal me with the button inside to begin the hunt.
translation: 参与者——也就是你——在竞技场集合。准备就绪后，就按那里的按钮通知我，开始狩猎。

original: I'll remotely release groups of ferals against which you must defend yourself. Don't worry, I'll make sure there aren't too many loose at one time.
translation: 我会远程遥控，释放一定数量的未驯服的野兽，而你则需要保护自己不被杀死。不要担心，我会确定一次不释放太多野兽的。

original: You're in for quite a treat, if I do say so myself.
translation: 要我说的话，你简直是来这里享受大餐的。

original: Do you have weapons for me to use?
translation: 你有什么武器可以给我用的么？

original: Weapons are your own responsibility, ma'am. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
translation: 你要自己解决武器问题，女士。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。

original: Weapons are your own responsibility, sir. I'm sure you have your own preferences, after all.
translation: 你要自己解决武器问题，先生。毕竟你有自己的武器偏好。

original: Tell me more about the Safari.
translation: 告诉我更多关于狩猎的事情。

original: Ah, but of course. What would you like to know?
translation: 啊，当然了。你想要知道些什么呢？

original: I do hope you enjoyed it. What shall we discuss?
translation: 我真希望你能乐在其中。我们需要讨论一些什么呢？

original: Need a refresher, do we? What would you like to know?
translation: 需要学习一下，是吗？你想要知道些什么呢？

original: Let's go over the Safari again.
I'm a bit short on caps at the moment.
translation: 我现在手头没那么多瓶盖。

original: Perhaps you're in the wrong place?  Do come back when you have the means.
translation: 也许你找错地方了吧?当你想到解决办法的时候再回来。

original: Here's 1,000 caps. Let's get this show on the road.
translation: 给你1000个瓶盖，我们开始吧。

original: That's the spirit! The other participants are waiting, so just press the button inside to let me know when to begin.
translation: 要的就是这种精神！其它的参与者都在等着呢，如果你准备好的话就按下那个按钮。

original: Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Well, we shall see, shan't we? Destroy him!
Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: You know nothing! You are nothing! If you're such a man of will, attack me and be done with it! Or do you fear for your life?
translation: 你知道些什么！你这杂种！如果你意志坚定，那就跟我做个了断吧！还是说你贪生怕死？

original: Ha! You make me laugh! So proud! So foolish! Yet, you are all talk! Attack me, if you wish to be done with this!
translation: 哈！真是笑话！如此自大！如此愚蠢！废话连篇！想做个了断的话，就放马过来吧。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is she on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道她会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: Yes, Desmond. But whose side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were so bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: You know nothing! You are nothing! If you're such a man of will, attack me and be done with it! Or do you fear for your life?
translation: 你知道些什么！你这杂种！如果你意志坚定，那就跟我做个了断吧！还是说你贪生怕死？

original: Ha! You make me laugh! So proud! So foolish! Yet, you are all talk! Attack me, if you wish to be done with this!
translation: 哈！真是笑话！如此自大！如此愚蠢！废话连篇！想做个了断的话，就放马过来吧。

original: Yes, Desmond. But who's side is he on? Do you know? Can you be sure? You always were do bad at choosing your allies.
translation: 是的，德斯蒙德。但你知道他会帮哪边吗？你能确定吗？你总是不会选择盟友。

original: Neat! I want some of it.
You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: You're free to take whatever you find in this disgusting place.
translation: 在这个令人恶心的地方，你找到的东西都归你所有。

original: What I came for is of no interest to you.
translation: 我来这里的原因与你无关。

original: Enjoy your spoils. I don't think our paths will ever cross again. And I think we can both thank Christ and say hallelujah for that.
translation: 好好享用你的战利品吧，我想我们以后的道路不再会有交集了。并且我们可以为此感谢主，并说声哈利路亚。

original: What's so great about his stuff?
translation: 他的东西好在什么地方？

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！

original: Calm down, there. You'll make a mess.
translation: 冷静点，你会把事情搞糟的！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！

original: Moron! You cannot possibly comprehend what this is worth!
translation: 笨蛋！你根本不会理解这到底有什么价值！

original: I've been battling with Calvert for over 200 years! And now, at last, I am the victor!
translation: 我跟卡尔弗特已经打了200多年的仗了！而现在，终于，一切都结束了，我赢了！

original: And now, 200 years of technology, knowledge, and research that he stole from me! Every time he beat me, it doesn't matter now!
translation: 在这200年里，无论他打败我这件事情，还是从我这里偷走的知识，技术和研究成果，现在都已经不再重要了！

original: No. You were right not to trust me. Die.
translation: 不，你不相信我是对的。死吧！

original: If nothing else, I have to say that you were good sport!
You'll be the appetizer before I destroy the professor!
translation: 你将会成为我消灭教授前的开胃菜！

original: It happens to us all. Let's go.
translation: 碰巧就落到我们头上了。走吧！

original: Brace yourself, my friend. You're about to witness the end of an era!
translation: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！

original: Because I wanted to. Just like I want to kill you now.
translation: 因为我乐意。就像我现在乐意干掉你一样。

original: Nihilism is so boring. Try it if you must, I could use the warmup before I kill the professor!
translation: 怀疑主义实在是无聊。如果你想试一下就去吧，我就把这个当作是杀死教授前的暖身运动。

original: I figured it was the best way to get him to drop his guard.
translation: 我认为这是让他放松警惕的最好办法。

original: And you... Impressive. Very impressive. Perhaps there's more to you than meets the eye.
translation: 至于你…令人印象深刻。非常令人印象深刻。也许你比你看起来的样子要强大得多。

original: I suppose I had you wrong. And that in itself is a once in a lifetime event.
translation: 我想我误解你了。我想这在我的一生中不会再犯第二次了。

original: Because I'm done taking orders from you. After this, we're through.
translation: 因为我受够了听从你的指挥了。从现在开始，我们没关系了。

original: After this, I won't require your services any longer. I suppose that works out now, doesn't it?
translation: 这一切结束以后，我就不再需要你的服务了。我想这就解决了我们之间的问题，不是吗？

original: So, since we're in agreement about this, let's go in there and "retire" the good professor!
translation: 因为你已经同意了，那么就让我们进去，让那个大教授“退休”吧！

original: Brace yourself, you're about to witness the end of an era!
translation: 你要打起精神，我的朋友，因为你将见证一个时代的终结！

original: Very nice. Now can you say "please don't kill me?"
translation: 很好，你现在能说“请别杀我”么？

original: No, I can't. But let's see if you can!
translation: 不，我不能。但是也许你能！

original: And I'm supposed to help you for free?
translation: 那么说我应该免费帮你么？

original: I'm 250 years old, so I think I have a shiny thing or two that might interest your tiny brain.
translation: 我已经250岁了，所以说我有一两个好东西可能会让你的小脑袋感兴趣。

original: So, if it's riches and weapons and things that you want, I have more than enough to spare. And all you have to do is do what you do best.
translation: 所以，如果你想要财富或者武器又或者是其他东西的话，我的储藏足够与你分享。而你则做你擅长做的事就好了。

original: Follow orders, and end Professor Calvert.
translation: 听从命令，杀了卡尔弗特教授。

original: I've waited a long time for this.
translation: 我为了这一刻已经等了很久了。

original: Savor the moment, my friend. This is the end of an era.
translation: 好好品味这一时刻吧，我的朋友。这是一个时代的终结。

original: And now you'll pay for it with your life.
translation: 现在是你拿命来偿还的时候了。

original: Is that so? I've come a long way, my friend. I highly doubt that my journey will end today!
translation: 是这样吗？这么长时间了，我一路走过来，我的朋友。我觉得我的旅程会在今天结束！

original: I don't take orders from anyone.
Fine then. Would it make your little feelbads all better if I said please?
translation: 好吧好吧。我如果对你说“请”，感觉会好点吧？

original: Then pretty please, fucking help me rid the world of Professor Calvert.
translation: 那么就非常的、非常的请你他妈的帮我解决掉卡尔弗特教授。

original: I just wanted to see you up close when I told you I was going to kill you.
translation: 我只是希望当我告诉你我要干掉你的时候，你乖乖地靠过来。

original: After 250 years, you think I'll go down to you? Ha! Try it!
translation: 250年了，你以为我会臣服在你的脚下？哈，有本事你就试啊！

original: I've been looking for you. I'm not going to side with this crazy brain thing.
translation: 我一直在找你。我不会支持这个疯狂的教授的。

original: Well now, finally you show some goddamn sense.
translation: 嗯，你终于说出点他妈的人话了。

original: So, if you're on my side, why did you destroy my jammer?
translation: 那么，如果你是站在我这边的，那你为什么还要摧毁我的干扰设备呢？

original: I'm tired of you pushing me around, Desmond.
translation: 我受够你的摆布了，德斯蒙德。

original: What? You betrayed me because I wasn't polite? Are you out of your fucking mind?
translation: 什么？你背叛我就因为我没有礼貌？你他妈是不是疯了啊？

original: Wait, what? You're going to kill yourself?
I... I can't explain it, but I know what I must do. I'm the last Blackhall.
translation: 我…我解释不清楚，但我我必须这样做。布莱克霍尔庄园家族只剩我一人了。

original: I don't need eyes to know you're there. Come here!
translation: 我不用眼睛就知道你在哪里。过来！

original: Yes, we shall be free of all limitations! Thank you, master. We shall be the instrument of your mighty will.
translation: 是的，我们不应受任何界线的阻碍！谢谢你，主人。我们将辅佐你万能的意念。

original: Yes, fine, go destroy the house and its "impurities." Just stop that jammer, and I'll be free of you morons, once and for all!
translation: 是的，好，去摧毁那房子和那“干扰器”，我就放了你这个白痴，你就永远自由了！

original: No need to worry, enlightened one. We shall re-consecrate the mansion, and remove the impurities disrupting your perfect guidance.
translation: 没必要担心，文明人。我们会重新供奉公馆，并清除一切干扰你完美指引的杂志。

original: No, not "astral knowledge" you simpleton! Psychic domination! And that still won't be possible until you destroy Desmond's jamming device.
translation: 不，不是“星界知识”，你这呆子！心灵控制！而且要等你摧毁了德斯蒙德的干扰器后才有可能！

original: Yes, and you will be able to spread your knowledge across the astral plane for all those wise enough to accept it!
translation: 是的，你将可以在整个星界对那些足够聪明的人散播你的知识。

original: At last, yes! Desmond will die, and our long struggle will finally end the only way it could have - with me as the victor!
translation: 最终，是的！德斯蒙德会死，而我们旷日持久的斗争终将迎来唯一可能的结局——我是胜者！

original: Soon, your sacred land shall be cleared of all obstacles. No longer shall its mystical powers be diminished!
translation: 不久，你神圣的土地将清除所有障碍。所蕴藏的神秘力量将不再衰弱！

original: It doesn't sound like you're having much fun here.
translation: 听起来你在这里过得不是很高兴。

original: I only been here a week or so, but I'm about ready to ditch this bunch of dummies. I already stole all the Punga I could ever need.
translation: 我到这里也不过一个星期左右，但是我已经准备好甩开这些白痴了。我已经偷到了足够多的膨葛了。

original: Hey, if you still wanna know where Jackson's hiding, I can help you out. No reason for me to give a damn about this place, y'know?
translation: 嘿，如果你还打算寻找杰克逊的藏身之处的话，我可以帮你。我他妈的才不关心这个地方呢，你要知道。

original: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
translation: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。

original: I need to know where he's at.
Sure, fine. Why not? I'm planning on ditching this place, anyway. If you're about to cause trouble with Jackson, all the more reason.
translation: 当然，好吧。为什么不呢？我本也在计划离开这里了。如果你想跟杰克逊一起在这里制造麻烦的话，那就更有理由了。

original: His cave's under the Cathedral, but it's hard to find. Use this key to get in through a wrecked ship down at sea cliffs to the east.
translation: 他的洞穴就在大教堂下面，但是很难找到。用这把钥匙到东边海崖下的失事船那里。

original: When you find that old idiot, tell him thanks for all the Punga I could steal!
translation: 当你找到那个老笨蛋的时候，替我转告他，我十分感激他种了那么多膨葛让我偷。
我该到哪儿去找杰克逊？

original: Not so fast, grub. You haven't earned the right to go to the transcendent master's retreat.
translation: 还不是时候，食物。你还没有得到许可，去进入至高无上的主人的休养地。

original: Couldn't tell you where he goes for his meditations. I swear, nobody tells me nothing. Maybe ask one of the others?
translation: 我不知道他去哪里冥想去了。我发誓，我什么都不知道。也许你应该问问其他人。

original: Alas, only the worthy may enter his nexus of meditation. He has not seen fit to enlighten me!
translation: 啊呀呀，只有有价值的人才能进入到他那奢华的冥想之地。我可不值得他的启发！

original: Off at his magical thinking-cave, I guess. We're not allowed to know where it is. He says we're not enlightened enough to understand.
translation: 我猜他在那个神奇的冥想之洞里吧。他不告诉我们他在哪里。他说我们不够格。

original: I swear, that sort of stuff pisses me off so much. I thought joining would be all drugs and magic, but it's just the same crap as everywhere else.
translation: 我发誓，这还真是让我生气。我原以为加入过程可能会涉及到一些药品或者魔法什么的，结果发现跟其他地方的那些垃圾事情也没什么不同。

original: Guess that's why I trailed Jackson to his stupid mystery cave!
translation: 我猜那就是为什么杰克逊把我带到他那愚蠢的洞穴里的原因！

original: Leader? That would be Jackson, a man of great wisdom. He has withdrawn to his Cavern of Communion, the better to contemplate the unknowable!
translation: 首领？我想那是杰克逊，一个充满了智慧的人。他离开了圣仪洞窟，是为了更好的冥想未知的事物。

original: Only the righteous are trusted to know where this nexus of understanding lies. And alas, I am not so blessed.
translation: 只有正直的人才会被信任，而去了解那些一目了然的谎言之间的关系。但是我并没受到那种祝福。

original: That would be Jackson. He's normally in here, leading sermons, tending to our needs, and speaking to us of his journeys in the realm of pure thought.
translation: 肯定是杰克逊。他通常都在这里传授知识，或者倾听我们的需求，又或者是用他那纯净的思想来讲述旅行故事。

original: I guess he went off on one of his meditations again. He's always off praying for guidance, especially these days.
translation: 我估计他肯能又去做什么冥想了吧。他总是祈祷能得到引导，尤其是这段日子。

original: You mean Jackson? I thought he was inside. I guess you could check there.
translation: 你是说杰克逊吗？我估计他可能在里面吧，你进去找找吧。

original: I guess you mean Jackson. He speaks the word of enlightenment at us, but he ain't fit to lead a song, much less this bunch of morons.
translation: 我想你说的是杰克逊吧。他时常开导我们，但是他却不是什么当领导的料，在一群白痴面前更是如此。

original: I been meaning to talk to him about this place, but he's off doing his meditation thing.
translation: 我本来是打算跟他谈谈关于这个地方的事情的，但是他好像又去做什么冥想了。

original: Damn, you are wet behind the ears. Jackson leads us, and don't you forget. When he talks, you listen up and catch every word!
translation: 该死，你还真是嫩得一无所知呢。杰克逊领导我们，你可别忘了这一点哦。每当他说话的时候，你要注意去听他说的每一个词。

original: Not that you'll be hearing much for now. He's off meditating.
translation: 你暂时是听不到什么了。他去冥想了。

original: Look to Jackson. He is the one who knows.
translation: 小心杰克逊。没人了解那个人。

original: But do not strain to see him here. Jackson is away.
translation: 别那么想着去见他了，杰克逊已经离开了。

original: I know it may seem that I am a brave shepherd to my flock, but the truth is far more humble.
translation: 我知道，这可能看上去我是我们这些人中勇敢的指引人，但是事实上，我是很卑微的。

original: I am nothing more than the largest fish in our school, as we swim through the astral seas... exploring, learning, and becoming one.
translation: 我不过像是鱼群里最大的一条鱼，畅游于星界之海…去探索，去学习，并且成为其中的一员。

original: But we are not swimming aimlessly! No, we have a beacon! The shining mind speaks to me in my meditations, and guides us always.
translation: 但我们并不是漫无目的地去畅游！不，我们有一个指引人！那光辉的思想总是引导着我的思维，引导着我们的方向。

original: How do you lead the tribe?
translation: 你是怎么领导这个部落的?

original: What you are interacting with is merely a holographic projection. And a rather clumsy one, at that, but it's all I can manage at the moment.
translation: 与你交互作用的东西不过是个全息图像投影仪。而且还是个残次品，不过吗，这也是目前我所能做到的了。

original: As for myself, you gaze upon one of America's greatest minds, preserved through the miracles of SCIENCE!
translation: 至于我吗，你目前正在凝视的，就是由创造奇迹的科学所保存的，美利坚最伟大的思想精华！

original: Much more elegant than shambling on as some rotting corpse for all eternity, don't you agree?
translation: 这比那个令人作呕的僵尸的永生来得要文雅得多，不是吗？

original: I might be able to help you. But first I want to know more.
translation: 我想我可以帮助你，但我需要先多了解一些事情。

original: Excellent. I cannot tell you how satisfying it is to find a suitable assistant after all these years.
translation: 太好了，这么多年，我终于找到了像你这样合适的帮手，这可真是太令我满意了。

original: Now, the ghoul is a pain, and may require disposal, but Desmond is only of secondary importance. The real target is a device in his possession.
translation: 那个僵尸是个障碍，也许应该除掉他，不过吗，德斯蒙德不那么重要，那个设备才是头等大事。

original: He has a jammer which limits my projection range to this pathetic cave. Remove that, and I can extend my reach so much further...
translation: 他的那个干扰设备限制了我的对这个可怜的洞穴的控制。除掉那个东西，我就可以将我的思想传播得更远了…

original: I can't promise anything, but tell me more.
translation: 我现在不能承诺你任何事，但你可以先多告诉我一些事情。

original: What have you got against the Ghoul?
More than you could possibly imagine with your squishy pink mind, but the only pressing matter at the moment is a device in his possession.
translation: 理由甚至比你那扁铲脑袋能够想象到的要多得多，但最令人心烦的是他手里的那台设备。

original: He has a jammer that limits my projection range to this pathetic cave. Remove that, and I can extend my reach so much further...
translation: 他的那个干扰设备限制了我的对这个可怜的洞穴的控制。除掉那个东西，我就可以将我的思想传播得更远了。

original: Killing Desmond would be a nice plus, but I'm sure we can get around to that later.
translation: 能除掉德斯蒙德那当然是更好了，不过吗，我想我们可以以后再考虑这件事情。

original: Useful? What are you using the tribe for?
translation: 有用？你打算用这个部落做什么？

original: At the moment, they've been no use at all, but I have very few options. They can't even seem to remove a single ghoul from a house.
translation: 目前来说，这些人一点用都没有，但是我的选择并不多。他们连个房子里的僵尸都搞不定。

original: How did you come to lead this tribe?
translation: 你是怎么成为这个部落的首领的？

original: Jackson believes me to be some kind of god. You'd think that would be good, but his interpretations of my commands leaves something to be desired.
translation: 杰克逊还以为我是什么神呢。你也许认为这不错，但是他对我的命令的解释说明却延缓了我渴望要做的事情。

original: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
translation: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。

original: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
translation: 有一个非常麻烦的僵尸，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要你立刻把它杀死，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。

original: He thinks I'm some sort of god, and I have no reason to disabuse him of the notion. This makes me de facto leader of the tribe, as it were.
translation: 他以为我是个神，并且我也没有理由去纠正他错误的想法。在某种程度上，这使我成为这个部族的实际首领。

original: Regardless, I trust you can be more effective than he has been. I need your help on an important task.
translation: 不管怎么样，你做事会比他更有效率吧。我需要你帮我做一个非常重要的事情。

original: There's a troublesome ghoul who lives in Calvert Mansion. I need him destroyed, and his jamming device neutralized, immediately.
translation: 有一个非常麻烦的僵尸，他住在卡尔弗特公馆。我需要你立刻把它杀死，并且毁掉它的干扰设备。

original: Why was Jackson talking to you?
translation: 杰克逊为什么要跟你谈话？

original: May I meet the Transcendent Master?
translation: 我可以见见至高无上的主人吗？

original: It is very rare that others are permitted to commune with the master. Many are too foolish to understand the great truths of his higher mind.
translation: 在这里，与主人直接交谈是非常少见的。很少有人能够理解他那更加高尚的思想。

original: But I sense in you a great potential. Perhaps you have what is needed to accept his teachings and grow from his wisdom.
translation: 但是我感觉你很有潜力。也许你能够理解他所传授的东西并且从他的智慧中获益。

original: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Seek him out, and all shall be revealed.
translation: 他在这里显灵，就在海蚀洞里的一个岩石上。找到他，你所有的疑问就会被解答了。

original: You mean, you're not really the one in charge of the tribe?
translation: 你的意思是，你不是这个部落真正管事的？

original: Would that I was so wise! No, true leadership of the tribe belongs to the higher mind of the enlightened one!
translation: 如果是那样的话，我可就太聪明了！不，我们部族真正的领导者属于那个高明且具有崇高思想的人。

original: Although his mind has moved beyond the need for flesh, his consciousness still returns here to guide our people. I merely interpret his wishes.
translation: 尽管他的思想已经超越了肉体，他的意识还留在这里引导我们。我只不过在口述他的希望。

original: He manifests here, high on a ledge in the great sea cave's well. Perhaps if you are fortunate, he will choose to share his wisdom with you!
translation: 他在此显灵，就在伟大海洋旁边洞穴里的一个平台处。如果你够幸运的话，他会与你分享他的智慧。

original: I just wanted to meet the Tribal leader.
translation: 我只想跟部落的领导见一面。

original: I may be the man who leads our physical affairs, but I cannot claim true wisdom. I take my orders from a higher master!
translation: 我大概可以被称为是这里实际事务的决策者，但是我并不是精神领袖。有更高阶的领导给与我命令。

original: Whether it be how to explore higher planes, or the decision to remove the disruptive ghoul, all wisdom comes from the Transcendent Master.
translation: 无论是定下长远目标，还是决定除掉恼人的僵尸，所有的智慧，学问与正确的判断都来自于那个至高无上的主人。

original: I was drawn to your eternal wisdom.
translation: 我被你永恒的智慧所吸引了。

original: How wonderful! Perhaps you shall be the one who can clear the holy land of its disruptive presence!
translation: 多好啊！也许你就是那个能够净化这片残破不堪的圣地的救世主。

original: Oh, but the Transcendent Master will want to hear of this! And as one so obviously led by visions, it is your right and honor to tell him yourself!
translation: 哦，但是这个消息要通知给至高无上的主人！你要亲自告诉给主人，这是你的权利也是你的荣誉，因为这一消息是多么显而易见的神谕啊。

original: After all, it is he who makes all true decisions about the spiritual growth of our tribe, including the decision to cleanse the mansion.
translation: 毕竟，他才是我们部族精神上的决策者，决策也包括净化那公馆。

original: You best keep this one to yourself, sweetie.   The family tonic gets real kick from our secret ingredient.  We just need a lil' bit of battery acid.
translation: 你最好把这个留给自己，宝贝。家传秘密配方炼制的补药可带劲了。我们只需要一点电池酸液。

original: Oh, don't look like that, now.
You reckon I'd be around to tell you about it if it weren't safe enough? Bring me six fission batteries and I'll scrape 'em into the mix.
translation: 要是危险的话，你以为我还会在这儿告诉你这些吗？给我六块电池，我来把它们磨成碎屑。

original: I thought so. Those things do carry a smell, don't they? Let me take 'em off your hands, then.
translation: 我也这么想。那些东西真的很难闻，不是吗？快丢掉。

original: Well, we'll need yeast. You can find it about anywhere, but there's a big stash on the boardwalk. Three sacks is enough.
translation: 好了，我们需要酵母。那东西到处都是，不过木板路上有一大片。三袋就够了。

original: I see. Thank you kindly for these.
translation: 我懂了。谢谢你这些东西。

original: I've got the yeast with me.
How much water do we need?
Punga fruit and lots of it. The stuff those loonies make at the church is best. Ten of those will do, but might cost you.
translation: 膨葛水果要很多。最好是那帮疯子在教堂种的。10个就行，不过可能要费点力气。

original: Wild fruit will do the trick, but you'll need twice as much of it.
translation: 野生水果也可以，但那样需要两倍的量。

original: Yeah, ten from the growers at the cathedral, or twenty wild ones.
translation: 是的，教堂的10个，或者野生的20个。

original: Well, that's quite a haul you have there, sweetie. You prefer to hand over the wild or the refined fruit?
translation: 喔，好大一堆水果啊，宝贝。你是要给我野生的还是精制的呢？

original: This enough Punga Fruit for you?
Wild fruit, eh? Just as good, if a sight weaker for flavor.
translation: 野生水果，嗯哼？也不错，希望味道不会太浓烈。

original: This enough Punga Fruit for you?
I see you sprung for the refined fruit. Good for you, sweetie.
translation: 我看你搞到了精制水果。太棒了，宝贝。

original: This enough Punga Fruit for you?

translation: 我们来谈谈补药的事吧。

original: Should be ready in a matter of hours. Check back soon.
translation: 应该能在数小时内准备完毕。再联系。

original: Brewin' low and slow, sweetie. Process takes about a day. Why don't you come back in a piece?
translation: 酿酒是很无聊的，并且还要花很长的时间的，亲爱的。整个过程大概要花上一天左右。你为什么不晚点再来呢？

original: What's the status on the tonic?
You're an eager one, ain't ya? I have to let the still air out a few days between brews. Check back with me later.
translation: 你还真热心，不是么?在酿酒期间，我需要把不流动的空气排放一下，这需要花上几天。过一段时间再回来吧。

original: Can we make another batch of tonic?
translation: 我们能再做一些补药么？

original: I reckon we can. Let's go over the ingredients again.
translation: 我认为我们能行。让我再检查一下配料。

original: Can we make another batch of tonic?
translation: 我们能再做一些补药么？

original: There aren't too many ingredients, but I brew large batches, so we need a good bit of each.
